Payroll_Payee_NIObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

validation.validation:
Invalid SCON.
SCON is nine characters in length and is formatted as follows:
1. Character 1 must be alpha -"S".
2. Characters 2 - 8 must be numeric.
3. Character 9 must be Alpha but may not be "G", "I", "O", "S", "U", "V" or "Z".
4. The 9th character must pass the modulus 19 check.
The Company specified is not valid for the Worker.
Payroll configuration does not support Position on NI. Please remove the Position and re-try or enable Position for NI.
Position is not valid for the Worker.
The field SCON is required and must have a value.
NI Category is invalid as of Effective Date supplied.
Worker is aged 21 or over, selected NI Category cannot be applied.
Worker is aged under 21, selected NI Category cannot be applied.
Date of Birth does not exist, selected NI Category cannot be applied.
CA2700 fields are only valid when NI Category is J, K, L or Z
Where CA2700 is received, both CA2700 checkbox and the tax year to which it applies must be selected.
SCON is not applicable for NI Category.
NI calculation method can not be changed from Directors to Standard during the tax year. Please change at the start of the next tax year.
Worker is aged [age_max] or over, selected NI Category cannot be applied
A record already exists for this Worker, Company and Effective Date (and Position if applicable).
Certificate of Election is only valid when NI Category is B, I or E.
Worker reaches State Pension Age on [SPA date], NI Category C or S cannot be applied
Worker reached State Pension Age on [SPA date], NI Category C or S must be applied.
Proof of Age Exemption is only valid when NI Category is C or S.
NI Category B, I and E are only valid for Female Employee
A Proof of Age Exemption selection is required for NI Category C or S
A Certificate of Election selection is required for NI Category B, I or E
